snippet: Kathryn Bigelow is developing a dramatic series about jihadi recruitment for HBO alongside the rapper and poet K’Naan Warsame.
abstract: Kathryn Bigelow will executive produce HBO series about jihadi indoctrination titled The Recruiters; show will be written and directed by Somali-Canadian rapper K’Naan Warsame
lead_paragraph: Kathryn Bigelow is developing a dramatic series about jihadi recruitment for HBO alongside the rapper and poet K’Naan Warsame.

headline.main: Series on Jihadists Is in the Works for HBO
headline.print_headline: Series on Jihadists Is in the Works for HBO
